system.effect: The blow breaks the target's leg with an agonising snap. He is Stunned for 1 round and knocked Prone. Reduce his Movement to 1 metre until he receives medical attention.

description.value:
Impact Damage to Leg (Severity 5)

The blow breaks the target's leg with an agonising snap. He is Stunned for 1 round and knocked Prone. Reduce his Movement to 1 metre until he receives medical attention.
